title: Functions: Reusable Code
description: Define and use functions to make your code more organized and reusable.

steps.title: Define a Function to Add Two Numbers
steps.prompt: Create a function named 'add' that takes two parameters and returns their sum

validation.errorMessage: Return the sum of a and b

hints: Return the sum: return a + b
steps.successMessage: Great! You've created your first function!

storyContext.narrative: 반복되는 계산을 함수로 만들어서 효율적으로 관리하고 싶어.
storyContext.initialDialogue: 함수를 사용해서 계산을 더 쉽게 할 수 있을까?
